41000000.English_Text:
The inside looks suspicious.
Can I break through if I grow stronger?
41000000.Chinese_Text:
这里面很可疑…
变得更强之后，能打碎吗…？

41000001.Original_Text: 아차!! 실수했네.. 점프로 다시 건너가 보자!!
41000001.English_Text:
The inside looks suspicious.
Can I break through if I grow stronger?
41000001.Chinese_Text:
这里面很可疑…
变得更强之后，能打碎吗…？

41000051.English_Text: (I should look for traces of the Hesuth.)

41001071.Original_Text: (해수를 처치했다! \n근데 추수갓은 여기 없는 것 같은데?)
41001071.English_Text:
(I defeated the Hesuth!
I don't think Jimmy Ace is here, though.)
41001071.Chinese_Text:
（成功消灭了海兽！
可是吉米神好像不在这里？）

41001122.Original_Text: (해수를 처치했다! \n근데 추수갓은 여기 없는 것 같은데?)
41001122.English_Text:
(I defeated the Hesuth!
I don't think Jimmy Ace is here, though.)
41001122.Chinese_Text:
（成功消灭了海兽！
可是吉米神好像不在这里？）

41001173.Original_Text: (해수를 처치했다! \n근데 추수갓은 여기 없는 것 같은데?)
41001173.English_Text:
(I defeated the Hesuth!
I don't think Jimmy Ace is here, though.)
41001173.Chinese_Text:
（成功消灭了海兽！
可是吉米神好像不在这里？）

41001224.English_Text:
(I defeated the Hesuth!
By the way, where's Munchi?)
41001224.Chinese_Text:
（成功消灭了海兽！
可是钗石好像消失了？）

41001275.English_Text:
(I defeated the Hesuth!
But where's Jimmy Ace?)
41001275.Chinese_Text:
（成功消灭了海兽！
可是吉米神到底在哪里...？）

41001479.English_Text: (I should leave the Hesuth Expedition for now.)

46000001.English_Text:
Be careful. The Lilybads
here are very aggressive.
46000001.Chinese_Text:
这里的莲叶人
极具攻击性，一定要小心。

46000002.Chinese_Text:
哟！小心一点！
这里有湖。

46000003.Original_Text: 행여 물에 빠지기라도 하면\n빠르게 움직일 수 없느니라.
46000003.English_Text:
You won't be able to move very quickly
if you fall into the water.
46000003.Chinese_Text:
如果不小心落入水中，
将无法快速移动。

46000004.Original_Text: 물론 상승경공을 익히면\n물에 빠져도 걱정 없겠지만 말이다~
46000004.English_Text:
Of course, you won't need to worry
about falling into the water if you learn advanced Windwalking.
46000004.Chinese_Text:
当然若能习得上乘轻功
就不需要担心落水～

46000005.English_Text:
Now!
Try out Sprint and Slide!
46000005.Chinese_Text:
就是现在！
快使用疾行和滑走！
